name: BugsTest
description: Unit tests for various bugs and edge cases in the Apache Commons CLI library.

test_cases.name: test11456
test_cases.description: Tests the parsing of options with optional and required arguments using both POSIX and GNU parsers.

test_cases.name: test11457
test_cases.description: Tests the presence of a long option (--verbose) in the parsed command line.

test_cases.name: test11458
test_cases.description: Tests the parsing of options with value separators and verifies the values using an iterator.

test_cases.name: test11680
test_cases.description: Tests the retrieval of option values with default values using different API versions.

test_cases.name: test12210
test_cases.description: Tests the parsing of command line arguments with exclusive option groups and nested options.

test_cases.name: test13425
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of missing arguments for options and expects a MissingArgumentException.

test_cases.name: test13666
test_cases.description: Tests the formatting and printing of help messages for command line options.

test_cases.name: test13666_Builder
test_cases.description: Tests the formatting and printing of help messages using the HelpFormatter builder.

test_cases.name: test13935
test_cases.description: Tests the parsing of command line arguments with required and optional option groups.

test_cases.name: test14786
test_cases.description: Tests the parsing of command line arguments with a required option.

test_cases.name: test15046
test_cases.description: Tests the parsing of command line arguments with conflicting options.

test_cases.name: test15648
test_cases.description: Tests the parsing of command line arguments with options that have quoted values.

test_cases.name: test31148
test_cases.description: Tests the parsing of command line arguments with options that have multiple arguments and properties.
